name: Rubiks Unboxed - a Cube in 2D
description: Rubiks Unboxed is an unfolded variant of the classic Rubik's Cube we all know and love. If you have never played around with a Rubik's cube, this app might be a great way to start learning and get a feel for it. To all the veteran cubers out there: Don't be fooled, Rubiks Unboxed is very unintuitive compared to its 3D counterpart and mastering it will require patience and dedication! Let's see who can reach the top of those Speed Cube leaderboards!
